text.betterbees.no_bees_inside: It doesn't seem like there are any Bees inside.
text.betterbees.one_bee_inside: There seems to be a single Bee inside.
text.betterbees.filled_with_bees_inside: It seems to be absolutely buzzing with Bees inside.
text.betterbees.multiple_bees_inside: There seems to be multiple Bees inside.
text.betterbees.no_honey_inside: There doesn't seem to be any Honey inside.
text.betterbees.filled_with_honey_inside: The Hive is dripping with Honey.
text.betterbees.almost_enough_honey_insi: There seems to be almost enough Honey to fill a Bottle.
text.betterbees.enough_honey_inside: There seems to be enough Honey to fill a Bottle, but the Hive can hold more.
text.betterbees.some_honey_inside: There seems to be a little bit of Honey inside.
